snippet.title: IBM Watson: The inside story of how the Jeopardy-winning supercomputer was born, and what it wants to do next
snippet.description: IBM Watson wowed the tech industry and a corner of U.S. pop culture with its 2011 win against two of Jeopardy's greatest champions. Here's how IBM pulled it off and a look at what ...

snippet.title: Vulnerable medical devices: A clear and present danger
snippet.description: Technology is helping to save lives, but vulnerable medical devices and computers are a real risk. Michael P. Kassner asks the experts about the state of healthcare security.
